definition: HMS Consort, Royal Navy destroyer involved in 1949 Amethyst incident on Changjiang

sentences.english: It allows both partners to keep their virginity intact for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 它保证了伴侣双方初夜之前都是处子之身。

sentences.english: That is the reason he must change partners endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 这是为什么他会不断的更换伴侣。

sentences.english: Ultimately, being with a true soul partner is all about being purposeful in love.
sentences.chinese: 在爱情中拥有一位真正的灵魂伴侣是每个人所希冀的。

sentences.english: My mother was his Fremen consort, Chani.
sentences.chinese: 我的母亲是他的弗里曼伴侣，加妮。

sentences.english: We have a right to know if a potential partner has herpes.
sentences.chinese: 我们有权知道潜在的伴侣是否患有疱疹。

sentences.english: Never forget your best friends in America.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要忘记你在美利坚合众国的好伴侣。
幸福伴侣总是强调积极的一面。

sentences.english: It is a part of their sexuality, not a partner replacement.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们性生活的一部分，性伴侣替代不了的。

sentences.english: Qin love is male partner to send?
sentences.chinese: 秦天问是男伴侣送的吗。

sentences.english: Are you sure you want him to your partner?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你想营他作陪的终身伴侣吗？

sentences.english: Does your spouse have a chore they despise?
sentences.chinese: 你的伴侣有什么不喜欢做的杂务吗？

sentences.english: The couple's civil partnership is not legally recognized in Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 这两人的民事伴侣关系在乌克兰不受法律认可。

sentences.english: The discovery also reveals how male squid compete for female mating partners.
sentences.chinese: 这一发现也揭示了雄性乌贼如何争夺交配伴侣的。

sentences.english: Unlike her friends! she never gaudio-videoe up hope.
sentences.chinese: 与她的伴侣的不同之处是，她从不甩手希望。

sentences.english: Cavorting pairs bow gracefully to each other.
sentences.chinese: 跳跃的伴侣，优雅地相互鞠躬。

sentences.english: to see how you and your partner support each other.
sentences.chinese: 看看你和你的伴侣是怎么互相支持的。

definition: the opposite sex/of the opposite sex/heterosexual/different in nature
partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
